settings.heading: Symptoms of Menopause
settings.description: Every woman's experience is unique. Learn about the common symptoms and understand what your body may be telling you.

settings.symptom_description: Sudden feelings of warmth, often most intense over the face, neck and chest
Episodes of sweating during sleep that can disrupt rest
settings.icon_svg: <svg width="24" height="24" fill="none" stroke="hsl(240, 60%, 50%)" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M20.354 15.354A9 9 0 018.646 3.646 9.003 9.003 0 0012 21a9.003 9.003 0 008.354-5.646z"/></svg>

settings.symptom_description: Difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep throughout the night
settings.icon_svg: <svg width="24" height="24" fill="none" stroke="hsl(240, 60%, 50%)" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M20.354 15.354A9 9 0 018.646 3.646 9.003 9.003 0 0012 21a9.003 9.003 0 008.354-5.646z"/></svg>

settings.symptom_description: Experiencing irritability, anxiety, or low mood more frequently
Decreased moisture and elasticity in vaginal tissues
settings.icon_svg: <svg width="24" height="24" fill="none" stroke="hsl(180, 60%, 50%)" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M3 13.125C3 13.625 5.25 18 12 21c6.75-3 9-7.375 9-7.875s-2.25-7.125-9-7.125S3 12.625 3 13.125z"/></svg>

settings.symptom_description: Changes in metabolism that may lead to weight gain, especially around the abdomen
settings.icon_svg: <svg width="24" height="24" fill="none" stroke="hsl(0, 70%, 60%)" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M13 10V3L4 14h7v7l9-11h-7z"/></svg>

settings.cta_text: Track your symptoms and share them with your healthcare professional
